CodeExample.Title: Get the OutlookItem's DateTimeCreated property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the OutlookItem's DateTimeCreated property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /DateTimeCreated HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the URL to get the OutlookItem entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the DateTimeCreated property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=DateTimeCreated query option to the entity-getting URL to retrieve the DateTimeCreated property value
